name: Store Interface 5
description: This Store Interface is great if you want to use images to showcase your Clover Inventory.

settings.label: Page width
settings.info:
Default page width recommendation is 1024px.
You can make changes here.

settings.label: Show Quantity Pop Up window after adding any item to cart
settings.info: This will show the Quantity selection window when selecting 'add to cart' button. The customer can still change the quantity later in the checkout process.

settings.label: Show Quantity Pop Up window for items with modifiers
settings.info: This will show the Quantity selection window for items with modifiers when selecting 'Choose Qty & Options' The customer can still change the Quantity later in the checkout processs. Note : this doesn't affect modifier Qty selection.

settings.label: Number of items per row
settings.info:
Change the default number of items/categories per row. You can choose from 1 to 12.
We recommend 3 or 4.

settings.label: Display Items Description
settings.info: This will allow you show the items descriptions under items names.

settings.label: Special instructions for individual items
settings.info: Allow customers to leave special instructions for individual items

settings.label: Show Special instructions Pop Up window after adding any item to cart
settings.info: After item/modifier is added to cart, immediately show pop-up to allow customer to add special instructions to that item

settings.label: Custom Text to appear in special instructions
settings.info: Custom Text to appear in special instructions after item is added to cart. This default message will appear to customers for special instructions -per line item, not the special instructions on the checkout page.
settings.default: Type your instructions here, additional charges may apply and not all changes are possible

settings.label: Color 1
settings.info: Used in : buttons background, icon cart background.

settings.label: Color 3
settings.info: Used on border when hover on items or categories.
